content:
# HyperCode: Environment Configuration Template
# Copy this file to .env and fill in your actual values
# NEVER commit .env to git (it's in .gitignore)
# Updated: November 11, 2025

# ============================================================================
# API KEYS (AI Model Integration)
# ============================================================================

# OpenAI API Key (GPT-4, GPT-3.5)
OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-...

# Anthropic API Key (Claude 3.5 Sonnet)
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=sk-ant-...

# Mistral AI API Key (Mistral Large)
MISTRAL_API_KEY=...

# Perplexity AI API Key (Research agent)
PERPLEXITY_API_KEY=...

# HuggingFace API Key (Model hub access)
HUGGINGFACE_API_KEY=...

# ============================================================================
# VECTOR DATABASE CONFIGURATION
# ============================================================================

# Pinecone (Cloud vector DB)
PINECONE_API_KEY=...
PINECONE_ENV=...
PINECONE_INDEX=hypercode-research

# Weaviate (Open-source vector DB)
WEAVIATE_URL=http://localhost:8080
WEAVIATE_API_KEY=...

# Milvus (Scalable vector search)
MILVUS_HOST=localhost
MILVUS_PORT=19530
MILVUS_USERNAME=...
MILVUS_PASSWORD=...

# ============================================================================
# DATABASE CONFIGURATION
# ============================================================================

# PostgreSQL (for future API backend)
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:password@localhost:5432/hypercode_dev

# SQLite (local development)
SQLITE_DB_PATH=./hypercode.db

# ============================================================================
# LOCAL AI MODEL (Ollama)
# ============================================================================

# Ollama local server configuration
OLLAMA_BASE_URL=http://localhost:11434
OLLAMA_MODEL=llama2  # or llama3, mistral, etc.

# ============================================================================
# GITHUB INTEGRATION
# ============================================================================

# GitHub Personal Access Token (for automated commits)
GITHUB_TOKEN=ghp_...

# GitHub username
GITHUB_USERNAME=welshDog

# GitHub repository
GITHUB_REPO=hypercode

# ============================================================================
# LOGGING & DEBUGGING
# ============================================================================

# Log level (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL)
LOG_LEVEL=INFO

# Enable debug mode (verbose output)
DEBUG=False

# ============================================================================
# RESEARCH & SCRAPING
# ============================================================================

# arXiv API email (for academic paper access)
ARXIV_EMAIL=your@email.com

# Google Scholar API (if using scholarly library)
SCHOLAR_TIMEOUT=10

# ============================================================================
# SERVER CONFIGURATION (Future API)
# ============================================================================

# Server host
SERVER_HOST=0.0.0.0

# Server port
SERVER_PORT=8000

# Environment (development, staging, production)
ENVIRONMENT=development

# ============================================================================
# SECURITY
# ============================================================================

# Secret key for session/CSRF protection
SECRET_KEY=your-super-secret-key-here

# CORS allowed origins
CORS_ORIGINS=http://localhost:3000,http://localhost:8000

# ============================================================================
# FEATURE FLAGS
# ============================================================================

# Enable AI code generation
ENABLE_AI_CODEGEN=true

# Enable research automation
ENABLE_RESEARCH_AUTO=true

# Enable quantum backend
ENABLE_QUANTUM=false

# Enable DNA computing backend
ENABLE_DNA=false

# ============================================================================
# RATE LIMITING
# ============================================================================

# API rate limit (requests per minute)
RATE_LIMIT_RPM=60

# Rate limit burst (max concurrent requests)
RATE_LIMIT_BURST=10

# ============================================================================
# NOTIFICATION CONFIGURATION
# ============================================================================

# Discord webhook for notifications
DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL=https://discordapp.com/api/webhooks/...

# Slack webhook (alternative)
SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL=https://hooks.slack.com/services/...

# Email configuration (for alerts)
SMTP_HOST=smtp.gmail.com
SMTP_PORT=587
SMTP_USERNAME=your@email.com
SMTP_PASSWORD=app-password
SMTP_FROM=hypercode@dev.local

# ============================================================================
# DEVELOPMENT OPTIONS
# ============================================================================

# Skip SSL verification (NEVER in production!)
REQUESTS_VERIFY_SSL=true

# Request timeout (seconds)
REQUEST_TIMEOUT=30

# Proxy configuration (if behind corporate proxy)
HTTP_PROXY=
HTTPS_PROXY=

# ============================================================================
# CACHE CONFIGURATION
# ============================================================================

# Cache backend (memory, redis)
CACHE_BACKEND=memory

# Redis connection (if using redis cache)
REDIS_URL=redis://localhost:6379/0

# Cache TTL (Time To Live) in seconds
CACHE_TTL=3600

# ============================================================================
# TEMPORARY: Development Convenience
# (Remove in production!)
# ============================================================================

# Skip authentication
SKIP_AUTH=false

# Use mock AI responses (for testing)
MOCK_AI=false

# Verbose API logging
VERBOSE_API=false
